https://www.ibm.com/consulting/bpo.page_name: Business Process Outsourcing (BPO) Consulting Services | IBM

xpaths.name:
Agentic AI in Action: Transforming the Future of Business Operations

Explore how agentic AI elevates business operations through seamless human-AI collaboration. Explore key insights in the IBV study.

Agentic AI for Business Study

IBM's approach to business process outsourcing starts with reimagining operational workflows by infusing Agentic AI and process automation to drive performance, resilience, and productivity. We unlock value faster with pre-built cutting-edge AI assets, assistants and agents on a global AI services delivery platform.

Our BPO solutions accelerate time to value, elevate skills and deliver a consumer-grade experience, enabling scalability and more efficient business outcomes. Innovate alongside our domain experts through a personalized approach to redesigning core processes and systems while de-risking operations. We help clients reimagine essential business operations to deliver business insights that create and maintain a competitive edge.

Transforming BPO with AI: IBM’s approach to BPO services
Read Moor Insights Report
What's new
How COOs are reinventing operations with AI, data, and innovation
IBM supercharges client value and consultant work with IBM Consulting Advantage, an AI services platform with a library of assistants
HR Operations
IBM is positioned as “Leader” by Everest Group in Multi-Process Human Resources Outsourcing (MPHRO) Services
Procurement Operations
IBM named a Leader in the 2024 HFS Horizons report on leading Sourcing and Procurement Service Providers
AI Services
Everest Group Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Generative AI Services PEAK Matrix® Assessment 2024
IBM positioned as a Leader in the 2025 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for Finance and Accounting BPO

IBM has been named a Leader in the 2025 Gartner Magic Quadrant for Finance and Accounting Business Process Outsourcing (F&A BPO), acknowledging our commitment to delivering innovative, for-purpose solutions that empower businesses to transform their finance operations effectively.

Learn what makes it possible 
IBM brings deep BPO industry expertise, partnerships and experience to transform end-to-end processes, helping businesses unlock value with AI agents and assets.
AI-driven finance business process outsourcing services

With 30,000+ skilled finance and accounting industry practitioners, we can help unleash the value of AI-driven finance, and deliver demonstrable outcomes across financial planning and analytics, procure to pay, order to cash, and record to report.

Reimagine your finance operations 
Modern talent and HR outsourcing

Our HR and Talent BPO services combine deep process and advanced technology expertise to help you create the essential AI-driven HR processes that result in better customer experiences and cost savings.

Explore an AI-first approach to modern HR operations 
Transform your talent operations with AI

Using AI-powered outsourcing services, we’ll help you achieve your hiring needs, develop the best in-house talent, define skilling and retention strategies, transform learning experiences and bridge skill gaps to help unlock your workforce potential.

Transform your talent acquisition and skills strategies with AI 
AI-driven Procurement transformation

The expertise to infuse Generative AI and automation into core procurement processes, enabling better real-time visibility, decision-making, and a deeper understanding of spend, contract management, strategic sourcing, supply chain, and pricing.

Reimagine you procurement operations 
Customer service transformation

With AI for customer service, IBM Consulting helps organizations develop a data and AI strategy to transform the customer interaction and empower their employees core competencies, delight customers and unlock new revenue streams for improved profitability.

Unlock efficiency and supercharge your agents with generative AI 
Transform your industry operations with the right balance of people, data, and AI

Boost revenue, enhance customer experience, and raise customer satisfaction for insurance, banking, financial services and more with IBM BPO services.

Industries in the AI era 
PepsiCo's journey towards responsibly scaling AI
Read how IBM Consulting helped PepsiCo establish a responsible AI framework, create a unified AI platform, and more.
Learn more
Anheuser-Busch
AB InBev alleviates its complicated HR landscape, reinvests in more value-added services, and is operating more cost-effectively with the help of IBM Consulting.
Explore the approach
Insights

Get the best of IBM in your inbox. Select from our collection of curated newsletters that deliver thought-provoking insights on information technology emerging trends.

Subscribe now
The CEO's Guide to Generative AI
As generative AI continues to rapidly evolve, operation teams can become an economy growth engine for the business.
Read about it here
GBS organizations of the future
Learn how to reimagine your shared services by cultivating smarter operations that leverage data and insights for enhanced value creation.
Learn what makes it possible
The power of AI & Automation: Intelligent workflows
92% of polled executives agree that their organization’s workflows will be digitized and will leverage AI-enabled automation by 2025
Learn more here
Learn why finance transformation propels business value
Aligning business functions to support agility, drive business outcomes, and enriching data are key factors that make digital transformation
Read about it here
Application management for hybrid cloud

Complete hybrid cloud management services to accelerate your cloud journey to unleash full potential of your investments.

Learn more 
IBM Business Automation Workflow

Automate your digital workflows to increase productivity, efficiency and data analytics, on premises or on cloud.

Learn more 
IBM watsonx Assistant

Deliver consistent and intelligent customer support across all channels and touch points with conversational AI.

Learn more 
Finance transformation consulting

Migrate legacy ERP apps to the cloud and turn finance into a competitive advantage.

Learn more 
Talent management consulting

Inspire your workforce and meet your complex HR needs with a people-centric approach to talent management.

Learn more 
IBM Consulting Advantage

IBM Consulting Advantage helps enable deeper insights and improved efficiency compared to traditional consultancy approaches.

Learn more 
Subscribe to Think Newsletter

Keep up with the latest news and insights from AI,security,  automation, data and infrastructure straight to your inbox.

Subscribe now
Know more
Explore career opportunities

Join our team of dedicated, innovative people who are bringing positive change to work and the world. 



Register now 
Visit IBM Consulting’s resources page

See our latest collection of reports, guidebooks, and thought leadership papers to help grow your business.

Learn more
